abstract.text: Constants that indicate which scale variant of a symbol image to use.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The definition of a symbol image includes multiple scale and weight variants. Scale variants offer a way to define the size of the image relative to layout guides in the symbol image’s definition file. The system chooses the appropriate size variant based on the available space and configuration options.

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your iOS, iPadOS, or tvOS app.

Creates a configuration object with the specified point-size and weight information.
Creates a configuration object with the specified point-size, weight, and scale information.
Creates a configuration object with the specified scale information.
Creates a configuration object with the specified font text style information.
Creates a configuration object with the specified font text style and scale information.
Creates a configuration object with the specified weight information.

abstract.text: Describes an integer.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
